message:
#MiMax is the new big!

It's our biggest phone yet with a super immersive 6.44" display, a massive long-lasting 4850 mAh battery for maximum fun and entertainment. Specs:

- Super thin and light at 7.5mm
- Full-metal body, yet weighs only 203g
- Beautifully designed, double-chamfered metal body, curved both in front and back
- Front surface covered by 2.5D glass made of Corning¬Æ Gorilla¬Æ Glass 3
- Qualcomm¬Æ Snapdragon‚Ñ¢ 652/650 processor
- Two or four A72 CPU cores, four A53 CPU cores
- Adreno 510 GPU
- Huge 4850mAh battery 
- 6.44-inch Full-HD display
- Up to 4GB RAM + 128GB flash (supports up to 128GB microSD)
- 16-megapixel camera with PDAF
- 5-megapixel front camera with Beautify
- Rear fingerprint sensor
- Supports all of India's 4G LTE bands and VoLTE
- Sunlight Display, Reading Mode
- MIUI one-handed mode, Quick ball, and Google one-handed keyboard for easy single-handed reachability
- Android M with upcoming update to MIUI 8
The big #MiMax and #MIUI8 launch event in India with Hugo Barra happens today at 11:30 AM IST (2PM GMT+8). Watch the livestream at c.mi.com ‚ò∫ See you! Don't forget the popcorn üòÅ

Mi QiCYCLE Electric Folding Bike, your smartest ride on two wheels. It's our smart bike with a companion app that gives you real-time info on every ride you take:

- IDbike Torque Measurement Method (TMM) intelligently measures the torque you apply and adjusts power based on your pedaling 
- Companion smartphone app displays in-depth info: bike status, GPS navigation, ride stats 
- 250W, 36V high speed motor 
- Panasonic 18650 20 x 2900mAh lithium-ion battery cells (same battery used by Tesla) with self-developed Battery Management System (BMS) that lets you go 45km on a single charge 
- Shimano Nexus 3-speed hub 
- Foldable and compactly lean at 14.5 kg 
- Provides real-time stats: speed, distance, power, dynamic power, calories consumed
- RMB2,999

Last weekend, we had an incredible three-way crossover meetup between fans from Malaysia, Singapore, and Indonesia. 

The event was held in Kuala Lumpur and organized completely by Mi fans. üòÉ

There were plenty of games, a talent show, gadget sessions featuring Mi 5 and Mi Max, and lucky draws for Mi fans to go home with Mi 5 and our coolest accessories.

Terima kasih for the tremendous support and love, Mi fans! ‚ù§
Happy Father's Day to all the dads out there! You're Batman, Superman, and Iron Man rolled into one super dad. üòçüòòüë™
Did you know you can store up to 5 fingerprint profiles on your Mi phone? ‚úã How many do you have stored and which finger do you use the most often to unlock Mi in a jiffy? ‚ò∫

Run with Mi! Last weekend was our first fun fan run in Beijing. The 10k Mipop Run was also our first Mi Pop event for 2016. üèÉ 

The run ended at the Great Wall of China and everyone had an amazing time racing towards the finish line. Mi Drone flew overhead to take snaps and CEO Lei Jun had a refreshing water break thanks to the water blaster stations we had. üòä

Mi fans, we heard you. Mi Band 2 now has a beautiful OLED display yet still packs an amazing 20-day battery! Priced at RMB 149, is this your favourite fitness and sleep tracker yet?

MI BAND 2 SPECS:
- Fitness, heart rate and sleep tracker
- OLED display, view time, step count, heart rate
- 20-day battery, IP67 water resistant
- ADI accelerometer and optical heart rate sensor
- Anodized 0.05mm ultra-thin button
- Upgraded pedometer algorithm
- Hypoallergenic silicone band
- 2nd gen Bluetooth 4.0 for faster, stable connections

We just announced a partnership with Microsoft that will have Mi phones and tablets ship with Microsoft Office and Skype for seamless productivity on-the-go. 

Which Office app are you excited to use on your Mi phone? ‚ò∫ Read more and share: 

http://news.microsoft.com/2016/05/31/microsoft-and-xiaomi-expand-partnership-to-bring-productivity-services-to-millions-of-devices-and-customers/

TGIF! Throwing a party at home and don't feel like writing down your Wi-Fi password? Just tap your network name from your Mi phone's Wi-Fi settings to generate a QR code that friends can scan, and poof! They're in. 

How often do you use this feature? Let us know and make sure to share this cool trick with your friends!

http://gph.is/1TFXAoJ
Feast your ears and get ready for a richer music experience with our Mi In-Ear Headphones Pro. Available now for just US$25.99. More summer treats over at http://www.mi.com/en/events/summertreat/

Fly to greater heights with #MiDrone, which sports a 4K ultra-HD camera with 3-axis stabilization. It's easy to learn and play with smart return home and flight controls. We hope to create innovation that everyone can enjoy, including drones! Will this be your very first drone?

- 4-propeller system with detachable shields  
- 17.4V battery 5100mAh, 27 minutes non-stop flying 
- 1080p or 4K UHD camera, with 104¬∞ wide-angle lens 
- 4K camera at 3840 x 2160 pixels; supports recording of stills in RAW format 
- 720p live video with low latency from up to 2km distance
- Camera attached to a 3-axis gimbal, stabilizes up to 2000 vibrations per second 
- GPS + GLONASS + vision-based positioning for max precision 
- Autopilot options: automatic take-off + landing, waypoint flight path planning, tap to fly on map, circle an object on the ground
- Intelligently detects low battery and returns home automatically 
- Real-time location tracking for easy retrieval even post crash 
- Hovers automatically at the edge of no-fly zones 
- Built-in PCB antenna array in remote control for maximum reach 
- Modular design and foldable landing gear 
- RMB 2499 for 1080p, RMB 2999 for 4K UHD version

NDTV Gadgets 360's Kunal Dua was at Google I/O to get the skinny on Mi Box, Xiaomi's 4K set-top box powered by Android TV which will be available in the US soon. üì∫ 

Check out how easy it is to find content using voice search on the Bluetooth voice remote and the beautiful and intuitive UI that offers deeply personalized suggestions the more you use it:

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=a9cLftXJpEk

Know someone who would love this? Make sure to share this video with them. ‚ò∫

Bloomberg's Emily Chang stopped by at Google I/O to talk to Xiaomi VP Hugo Barra about Xiaomi's commitment to Daydream, Mi Box's US debut, and how the future looks for Mi. üòä 

Watch and share with friends: 

http://www.bloomberg.com/news/videos/2016-05-19/xiaomi-s-barra-on-mi-box-virtual-reality-and-smartphones

Mi Box, our 4K Android TV set-top box, will be coming soon to the US! Play and stream 4K UHD videos at 60fps. Mi Box supports HDR videos and comes with a bluetooth voice remote to search through Google Play's massive content library and apps. Watch Sascha Preuter's Android TV session live: https://www.facebook.com/hbarra76/videos/10153411698516612/

Google VP Clay Bavor just announced at #io16 that Xiaomi is one of Google‚Äôs first Android partners to make Daydream-ready devices. Daydream is Google‚Äôs platform for high-performance mobile VR built on top of Android N. Are you ready to explore the world of VR with Mi?

Mi Box specs:
60fps 4K video decoding
HDR10 and HDMI 2.0a support
Dolby Digital Plus + DTS surround sound
Bluetooth voice remote
USB port for additional storage
802.11ac Wi-Fi
Optional Mi Game Controller for a console-grade gaming experience. 

If you're here at I/O, join Hugo for Mi Box demos in the Living Room Sandbox tomorrow at 12pm. See you there!

Mi Box, our 4K Android TV set-top box, will be coming soon to the US! Play and stream 4K UHD videos at 60fps. Mi Box supports HDR videos and comes with a bluetooth voice remote to search through Google Play's massive content library and apps. Watch Sascha Preuter's Android TV session live: https://www.facebook.com/hbarra76/videos/10153411698516612/

Google VP Clay Bavor just announced at #io16 that Xiaomi is one of Google‚Äôs first Android partners to make Daydream-ready devices. Daydream is Google‚Äôs platform for high-performance mobile VR built on top of Android N. Are you ready to explore the world of VR with Mi?

Mi Box specs:

HDR10 and HDMI 2.0a support

If you're here at I/O, join Hugo for Mi Box demos in the Living Room Sandbox tomorrow at 12pm. See you there!
Guess which super combo move we'll be making at #io16?
2 days to #io16! We're excited to be a part of Google I/O this year, exploring the future of tech - Android, mobile, TV, VR and more. Any guesses what this might be?

Maurizio Pesce of Wired reviews #Mi5 

"The Mi 5 is noteworthy because of the excellent capabilities of its hardware. The fingerprint sensor is fast and accurate, even if you have wet hands. The camera is among the best you‚Äôll find in a mid-budget smartphone. And the gorgeous, bezel-free display is a beauty."

Read and share with friends: http://www.wired.com/2016/05/review-xiaomi-mi-5/

Go Max or go home! Today we launch #MiMax, our largest device with an immersive 6.44‚Äù display. Features an ultra-thin 7.5mm metal body but houses a 4850mAh battery. Priced from RMB1499. Are you ready to supersize your phone viewing experience?

#MIUI8, our useful and easy-to-use interface has a new design and major upgrades  across the apps you use daily - Gallery, Notes, Calculator, Scanner and more. Learn more: http://en.miui.com/thread-278760-1-1.html. Details for the Global #MIUI8 launch will be coming soon, stay tuned!

Mi Max specs
- 6.44" large immersive display
- 4850mAh all-day battery
- Qualcomm Snapdragon 650/652
- 4GB RAM +128GB Flash + 128GB MicroSD
- 16MP PDAF and 5MP cameras
- 7.5mm ultra-thin metal body, weighs 203g
- Fingerprint recognition
- 4G Dual SIM
Our global Mi fans are here to join us in Beijing for our #MiMax launch! Hear their excitement and expectations before we unveil the phone shortly.

Any phone with a large display should still feel comfortable to the grip, and give you at least a full-day battery to get through the day! Mi Max is designed with our power users in mind, so we now offer Mi phones with different display sizes in each category. Which will be your pick? Stay tuned tomorrow as we bring you the details of #MiMax and #MIUI8.
Don't forget to give that special woman in your life a big hug today. Happy Mother's Day from Mi! üë©üë∂üòç‚ù§

#MIUI8 is also blooming gracefully this 10 May. Expect many new thoughtful features that will make your phone experience more enjoyable! This artwork below encompasses our design philosophy. What do you think it's inspired by? ;) MIUI ROM
May the 4th be with you, Mi young Padawans üòä #MayThe4th
Share if you know which favorite May meme this is. üòÅ Happy weekend and enjoy the fruits of your labor today!

#MiMax is coming soon! It's a phone with a large display yet fits well in your hands and pockets. 

I like phones with large displays because _________.
Today's #MIUI8 sneak peek brings you an all new caller display. Our MIUI design philosophy seeks excellence by paying attention to minute details. Do you see it? ;)
Please join us in welcoming our 8 lucky global Mi fans who will be attending our Mi Product Launch in Beijing!

We've refreshed our Notes app in MIUI 8. Single swipe down to quickly create a new note, and a double swipe up to delete. Check out the paper shredding animation! Slick? What else do you look forward to?

CNET's Jessica Dolcourt went on a tour of Xiaomi HQ in Beijing. She got to try out the Ninebot mini and ate rice cooked by our latest Mi Induction Heating Pressure Rice Cooker. üçö Yum! 

Check out the gallery here: 

http://www.cnet.com/pictures/inside-xiaomis-headquarters-pictures/

How about you? Which areas of HQ do you want to visit and what do you want to do while you're there? üòä
Go big with #MiMax. Work and play made more fun on a bigger screen.
We're sure many of you are looking forward to our MIUI 8, launching on 10 May together with Mi Max. Here's a sneak peek at our new notification shade demo. Like it?

We're launching Mi Max, our upcoming Mi Phone with our largest screen to date, and MIUI 8 on 10 May. We want YOU to be a part of this! We're incredibly excited to invite 8 of our global Mi fans to this event in Beijing. Apply now and submit your application by 27 April 12pm (+8 GMT). What are you looking forward to? ;)

Bailey Stein of Android Authority thinks #Mi5 is astonishingly impressive. Read full review: http://www.androidauthority.com/xiaomi-mi-5-review-685776/

What do you love the most about Mi 5 and its amazing tech breakthroughs? ‚ò∫

Surp-rice! We love this adorable Mi bunny bento created by the super-talented Shirni Ong of WasabiSays.com from Malaysia. 

Wanna take a bite out of Mi? üòÅ Check out her how-to guide here: http://www.wasabisays.com/xiaomi-bunny/  üê∞üçô

Fast Company's Jared Newman's take on #Mi5:

"The Xiaomi Mi 5 is a darned good smartphone for the price, but it's the ecosystem that makes it intriguing.

The Mi 5 is a conversation-starter, at least in my experience. People see the aluminum trim and curved white glass back and want to know what they‚Äôre looking at‚Äîa rare quality for a sub-$400 phone.

The Mi 5 excels at more than just looks. It‚Äôs also fast at opening, closing, and moving through apps, thanks to a top-of-the-line Qualcomm Snapdragon 820 processor and 3 GB of RAM. Xiaomi didn‚Äôt skimp on the display, in terms of maximum brightness and viewing angles, and offering more pristine whites and vibrant colors to my eye."

Read: http://www.fastcompany.com/3058563/startup-report/xiaomi-mi-5-review-a-nifty-cheap-phone-yes-but-also-something-bigger
Pop quiz! How well do you know MIUI? Can you tell which stock MIUI apps these are just from the icon color (based on the default theme)? üòÅ üé®

#MiFanFestival year 6 in numbers: Over RMB1.87 billion (US$289M) total sales and 46.83 million participants in China celebrated with Mi. Thanks as always for making our birthday awesome‚Äîsee you at next year's bash! üòä üòò üéÇ üéâ 6Ô∏è‚É£

Happy birthday to Mi! Xiaomi turns 6 today, and as always, we celebrate our birthday with our Mi fans! Mi Fan Festival has started in China, India, Singapore, Malaysia, Hong Kong, Taiwan, and more, where fans are treated to great deals and new product launches. 

Want to celebrate with Mi? Make sure to visit our MIUI forum (en.miui.com), too, where there are special medals and prizes that await Mi fans. Thanks for being super awesome fans and for sticking with us all these years. 6Ô∏è‚É£

There's more to Mi than meets the eye: Xiaomi and Hasbro are collaborating to crowdfund a Mi Pad 2 Transformer that turns into a robot (Soundwave). 

The R&D team found it a challenge to be able to turn the incredibly slim 7mm Mi Pad 2 into a 3D robot, but they managed to do so via a 30-step folding assembly. They also made sure that the model looks and feels almost exactly like Mi Pad 2! How cool is that?? üòÅ

"The Xiaomi Mi 5 is hands-down the best Chinese smartphone I've ever used." - Snaps for #Mi5 from Mashable's Ray Wong's review on Snapchat! üëª

"The phone's really fast‚Äîit's got the latest Qualcomm Snapdragon 820 processor, performance has been really fantastic‚Ä¶fingerprint sensor works really quickly‚Ä¶It's just too bad you can't buy one in the US‚Ä¶but if it is available in your region, yes, buy it, it's got it all."

Watch full review here and share with your friends üòä
